analysis.description:
ERC20Basic.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0x649d4e11d5e40e051aa30e169b5c8265e26aa5e9.sol#33)
MNX.tokenPerETH should be constant (/unique_chucks/4/0x649d4e11d5e40e051aa30e169b5c8265e26aa5e9.sol#60-61)
